verses.verse: Now the Philistines <WH6430> gathered together <WH6908> <WH8799> all their armies <WH4264> to Aphek <WH663>: and the Yisra'ELites <WH3478> pitched <WH2583> <WH8802> by a fountain <WH5869> which is in Yizre`el <WH3157>.

And the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> passed on <WH5674> <WH8802> by hundreds <WH3967>, and by thousands <WH505>: but David <WH1732> and his men <WH582> passed on <WH5674> <WH8802> in the rereward <WH314> with Achish <WH397>.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> the princes <WH8269> of the Philistines <WH6430>, What do these Hebrews <WH5680> here? And Achish <WH397> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the princes <WH8269> of the Philistines <WH6430>, Is not this David <WH1732>, the servant <WH5650> of Saul <WH7586> the king <WH4428> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, which hath been with me these days <WH3117>, or these years <WH8141>, and I have found <WH4672> <WH8804> no fault <WH3972> in him since <WH3117> he fell <WH5307> <WH8800> unto me unto this day <WH3117> ?

And the princes <WH8269> of the Philistines <WH6430> were wroth <WH7107> <WH8799> with him; and the princes <WH8269> of the Philistines <WH6430> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Make <WH7725> this fellow <WH376> return <WH7725> <WH8685>, that he may go again <WH7725> <WH8799> to his place <WH4725> which thou hast appointed <WH6485> <WH8689> him, and let him not go down <WH3381> <WH8799> with us to battle <WH4421>, lest in the battle <WH4421> he be an adversary <WH7854> to us: for wherewith should he reconcile <WH7521> <WH8691> himself unto his master <WH113>? should it not be with the heads <WH7218> of these men <WH582> ?

Is not this David <WH1732>, of whom they sang <WH6030> <WH8799> one to another in dances <WH4246>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Saul <WH7586> slew <WH5221> <WH8689> his thousands <WH505>, and David <WH1732> his ten thousands <WH7233> ?

Then Achish <WH397> called <WH7121> <WH8799> David <WH1732>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Surely, as the YY <WH3068> liveth <WH2416>, thou hast been upright <WH3477>, and thy going out <WH3318> <WH8800> and thy coming in <WH935> <WH8800> with me in the host <WH4264> is good <WH2896> in my sight <WH5869>: for I have not found <WH4672> <WH8804> evil <WH7451> in thee since the day <WH3117> of thy coming <WH935> <WH8800> unto me unto this day <WH3117>: nevertheless the lords <WH5633> favour <WH2896> thee not <WH5869>.
Wherefore now return <WH7725> <WH8798>, and go <WH3212> <WH8798> in peace <WH7965>, that thou displease <WH6213> <WH8799> <WH7451> <WH5869> not the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430>.

And David <WH1732> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Achish <WH397>, But what have I done <WH6213> <WH8804>? and what hast thou found <WH4672> <WH8804> in thy servant <WH5650> so long as <WH3117> I have been with thee <WH6440> unto this day <WH3117>, that I may not go <WH935> <WH8799> fight <WH3898> <WH8738> against the enemies <WH341> <WH8802> of my lord <WH113> the king <WH4428> ?

And Achish <WH397> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and said <WH559> <WH8799> to David <WH1732>, I know <WH3045> <WH8804> that thou art good <WH2896> in my sight <WH5869>, as an angel <WH4397> of 'Elohim <WH430>: notwithstanding the princes <WH8269> of the Philistines <WH6430> have said <WH559> <WH8804>, He shall not go up <WH5927> <WH8799> with us to the battle <WH4421>.

Wherefore now rise up early <WH7925> <WH8685> in the morning <WH1242> with thy master's <WH113> servants <WH5650> that are come <WH935> <WH8804> with thee: and as soon as ye be up early <WH7925> <WH8689> in the morning <WH1242>, and have light <WH215> <WH8804>, depart <WH3212> <WH8798>.

So David <WH1732> and his men <WH582> rose up early <WH7925> <WH8686> to depart <WH3212> <WH8800> in the morning <WH1242>, to return <WH7725> <WH8800> into the land <WH776> of the Philistines <WH6430>. And the Philistines <WH6430> went up <WH5927> <WH8804> to Yizre`el <WH3157>.
